div.class: spn gb-social-icons top ui-clear hidden hide480 noprint

div.h3: On April 16th, 2020; Governor Cuomo announced an extension to the statewide school closure. Schools across the state will now be closed through May 15th, 2020. During this time schools will continue to provide remote instruction, food service, and child care options for essential personnel. Continue to monitor the district website and social media as these sources provide the most up-to-date information. As always, if you need further support or have questions, please do not hesitate to contact the district office. Please stay safe, and whenever possible stay home.

div.class: spn gb-social-icons bottom ui-clear hidden hide960 show480 noprint
